title: Summer Greeting Card
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Hey, Eli-chan, do you know? Apparently, today is summer greeting card day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Summer greeting card day? Huh, I didn’t know we had a day like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, so umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I think I know what you’re thinking about, Honoka. You want to send a greeting card to someone, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oooh! As expected of Eli-chan! You’re mo~stly right, but there’s something else.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Something else?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You see, I do want to write a greeting card, but I want to use that greeting card as an invitation to a summer greeting party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A summer greeting party.... I’ve never heard of that before. What are we going to do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>We haven’t met up much with the members of Aqours and Nijigaku recently, right? So I want to eat sweets and play games at home with everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, I guess the best way to check up on everyone is to meet them directly, huh. That’s very like you, Honoka.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
